lines.text: Come off it John, we all have something to hide, what a boring life it would be if we didn't.
All Russians are spies, it's how they're brought up.
Are you aware that Lord Astor has denied impropriety in his relationship with you?
Because this shit's deep. That story? Gunshots at home of society doctor, got a picture of the girl? It's going to make some people very very nervous.

And listen, that's not the half of it. If what this tart has just told me is true, then we are sitting on dynamite. Look, we can't run with it until we get more evidence, but it's John Profumo. The bloody War Minister's involved!
Yeah, I thought you'd like that.
